item.title: Shader Toolchain: HLSL in Vulkan
item.description: On 2018 Vulkan Developer Day in Montr√©al, I gave a talk regarding “Shader Toolchain: HLSL in Vulkan”. Here are the links to the video recording, slides, and documentation/downloads for DirectX Shader Compiler (DXC)’s SPIR-V CodeGen.
